text:
Hi, we have an enterprise client on a tight deadline that’s going to be managing multiple sites in a single account. they’re in the process of setting up the “spaces,” (URLs?) for lack of a better word, and in the meantime, i want to get familiar with how i’m going to clone templates, etc. across the sites in the account.

i’m not seeing anything practical in the learning center about cloning items across sites, and i don’t see a way to add multiple sites into my sandbox account. where can i find out the steps i’m going to be taking, and maybe some video or screenshots, so i’m prepared?
not exactly; this will be within one enterprise account, not across different HubSpot accounts — but that gives me some sort of idea. thanks
